lines.text: Have you done the nasty yet?
Why you got to show off so much?
Cause I ain't got that much to show.
I woke up in the morning, went to take a piss, looked down, and all I saw was teeth marks.

[sing while combing his hair]
Hey, hey, what do you say... Karchy Jonas is coming your way...

[Karchy is hidden in a confessionary pretending to be a priest]
Bless me, father, for I have sinned. It's been three days since my last confession. The reason I'm here today, father... you know what it is. I just can't stop doing it. I get these thoughts and I can't keep my hands off of it. Father? Are you there, father? I know you said I was gonna go blind, father. I don't wanna go blind. Last night I did it three times. I'm doing so much that it hurts when I touch it. I wanna kill my dad again. I can't take it anymore. I hate him. I hate him, father. I just can't stand him hitting on my mom anymore.
Mr. Jonas! Get out of here. Gimme that! How dare you? Out! Out! You went too far this time. Too far!
